Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][KPI Display]Verify that User can view CBM and Weight KPIs as combined component
Description: Verify both CBM and Weight KPIs appear side by side in one visual container
Precondition: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics widget is visible; 4. KPI components are available
Steps: 1. Navigate to Dashboard module; 2. Locate Utilization Metrics widget area; 3. Open the Utilization Metrics component; 4. Observe KPI display layout; 5. Check for CBM KPI visibility; 6. Check for Weight KPI visibility; 7. Verify both KPIs appear in single container
Expected Result: 1. Dashboard module loads successfully with widget access; 2. Utilization Metrics widget area is visible and accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics component opens without errors; 4. KPI display layout is clearly visible; 5. CBM KPI is displayed with proper formatting; 6. Weight KPI is displayed with proper formatting; 7. Both KPIs are confirmed to appear side by side in one visual container
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Widget: Utilization Metrics; KPIs: CBM and Weight

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][CBM Calculation]Verify that User can view correct average CBM utilization calculation
Description: Verify CBM KPI displays correct average value based on calculation formula
Precondition: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics widget is visible; 4. CBM calculation data is available
Steps: 1. Navigate to Utilization Metrics widget; 2. Locate CBM KPI display area; 3. Note displayed CBM utilization value; 4. Access job CBM utilization data; 5. Calculate Σ(Job CBM Utilisation / Total CBM Capacity); 6. Compare calculated value with displayed value; 7. Verify CBM KPI shows correct average
Expected Result: 1. Utilization Metrics widget loads successfully; 2. CBM KPI display area is visible and accessible; 3. Displayed CBM utilization value is clearly readable; 4. Job CBM utilization data is accessible for verification; 5. Calculation formula is applied correctly; 6. Calculated value matches displayed value; 7. CBM KPI accuracy is confirmed with correct average value
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Calculation: Σ(Job CBM Utilisation / Total CBM Capacity)

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][Weight Calculation]Verify that User can view correct average weight utilization calculation
Description: Verify Weight KPI displays correct average value based on calculation formula

Weight KPI accuracy is confirmed with correct average value

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][Positive Comparison]Verify that User can view positive comparison values in green color
Description: Verify positive percentage comparison values are displayed in green color
Precondition: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics widget is visible; 4. Time period filters are available
Steps: 1. Navigate to Utilization Metrics widget; 2. Locate time period filter options; 3. Select 7 Days time period filter; 4. Wait for data to update; 5. Observe percentage comparison values; 6. Check for positive comparison indicators; 7. Verify positive values appear in green color
Expected Result: 1. Utilization Metrics widget loads successfully; 2. Time period filter options are visible and accessible; 3. 7 Days filter selection is applied successfully; 4. Data updates complete without errors; 5. Percentage comparison values are clearly visible; 6. Positive comparison indicators are properly displayed; 7. Positive values are confirmed to appear in green color
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Filter: 7 Days; Comparison: Positive Values

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][Time Filter Update]Verify that User can update data using date picker and preset filters
Description: Verify KPI and graph data updates based on selected time period filters
Precondition: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics widget is visible; 4. Time filter options are available
Steps: 1. Navigate to Utilization Metrics widget; 2. Locate time filter options (24H 30D custom range); 3. Select 24H time filter; 4. Observe KPI data updates; 5. Check graph data changes; 6. Apply 30D filter and verify updates; 7. Test custom range filter functionality
Expected Result: 1. Utilization Metrics widget loads successfully; 2. Time filter options (24H 30D custom range) are visible and accessible; 3. 24H filter selection is applied successfully; 4. KPI data updates to reflect 24H period; 5. Graph data changes to show 24H timeframe; 6. 30D filter applies and updates data correctly; 7. Custom range filter functionality works as expected
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Filters: 24H 30D  Custom Range; Data: KPI and Graph Updates

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][Custom Comparison]Verify that User can view custom period comparison logic with proper color coding
Description: Verify custom duration comparison shows percentage change with appropriate color coding
Precondition: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Utilization Metrics widget is visible; 4. Custom date range options are available
Steps: 1. Navigate to Utilization Metrics widget; 2. Locate custom date range selector; 3. Select custom time period range; 4. Wait for comparison data to load; 5. Observe percentage change values; 6. Check color coding for positive/negative values; 7. Verify comparison reflects custom duration vs prior period
Expected Result: 1. Utilization Metrics widget loads successfully; 2. Custom date range selector is visible and accessible; 3. Custom time period selection is applied successfully; 4. Comparison data loads without errors; 5. Percentage change values are clearly displayed; 6. Color coding properly indicates positive/negative values; 7. Custom duration comparison is confirmed accurate vs prior period
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Filter: Custom Range; Comparison: Duration vs Prior Period

Chart lines and colors are clearly visible; 5. CBM metric line is displayed with proper formatting; 6. Weight metric line is displayed with proper formatting; 7. Both lines are confirmed to have distinct colors for easy identification

Title: [Dashboard][Utilization Metrics][X-Axis Scaling]Verify that User can view proportional date representation on X-axis

Expected Result: 1. Utilization Metrics widget loads successfully; 2. Line chart with X-axis is visible and accessible; 3. X-axis date labels are clearly visible and readable; 4. Date interval spacing appears proportional; 5. Hover action reveals accurate date information; 6. Date labels correctly match selected period range; 7. Proportional date intervals are confirmed to be displayed correctly
Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Chart Type: Line Chart; Feature: X-Axis Date Labels; Validation: Proportional Intervals

Test Data: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management; Chart Type: Line Chart; Feature: Hover Tooltip; Data: Date and Metric Values
